page.title: 10COCKFIELD CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: We play captain ball at school in the hall.We usually play it when it is cold and wet outside.You need at least 6 people in each team.You need 2 benches and a ball.On each bench stand the captains-at opposite ends of the hall. In front of the captains you need 2 defenders,one midfield player and 2 attackers.The idea is for the defenders and the midfield player to pass the ball to the attackers,who try to score by passing the ball to the captain on the bench.Players are not allowed to touch opposing players or to run with the ball.At home and in the playground we play "It".One of us is "It" and when that one is touched by another player, he has to run and try to touch someone else.Another game that we play at home is "Hide & Seek".A person has to hide while another one has to count to 100.Then the second person can seek.
